import React from 'react' const About = () => { return (

About

I am UI Designer/Developer with over 15 years experience in a fast paced digital agency environment. I love to solve problems, whether it be through clever design or clean code. Bringing creative ideas and solid design to life is what makes me tick.{" "}

In my current role I work independently managing my own smaller scale projects and client base, as well as working as part of the wider team on larger projects.{" "}

I'm currently working through an online full stack development course.

When I'm not coding or upskilling I like knitting, crochet, sewing, and tipping away in my garden while listening to true crime podcasts. 🕵

); } export default About
